title: React Hooks Complete Guide
creator: Codevolution
desc:
Master React Hooks with this comprehensive tutorial. Learn useState, useEffect, useContext, useReducer, and how to create custom hooks. Perfect for developers looking to understand modern React patterns and best practices.

Topics covered:
- useState basics and advanced patterns
- useEffect and cleanup functions
- useContext for state management
- useReducer for complex state
- Custom hooks creation
- Performance optimization tips

title: Next.js 14 Full Course
creator: Traversy Media
desc:
Complete Next.js 14 tutorial covering all the latest features including App Router, Server Components, Server Actions, and more. Build production-ready applications with the most powerful React framework.

What you'll learn:
- App Router architecture
- Server and Client Components
- Data fetching strategies
- Dynamic routing
- API routes
- Deployment on Vercel

title: TypeScript for Beginners
creator: Programming with Mosh
desc:
Learn TypeScript from scratch in this beginner-friendly tutorial. Understand types, interfaces, classes, and how TypeScript makes your JavaScript code more robust and maintainable.

Course content:
- TypeScript basics and setup
- Type annotations
- Interfaces vs Types
- Classes and inheritance
- Generics
- Decorators
- Integration with React

title: CSS Flexbox Tutorial
creator: Web Dev Simplified
desc:
Master CSS Flexbox layout in 20 minutes! This concise tutorial covers everything you need to know about Flexbox to create responsive layouts quickly and efficiently.

Key concepts:
- Flex container properties
- Flex item properties
- Alignment techniques
- Responsive design patterns
- Common layout examples
- Best practices

title: REST API Design Best Practices
creator: Tech With Tim
desc:
Learn how to design professional REST APIs following industry best practices. This tutorial covers HTTP methods, status codes, versioning, authentication, and more.

Topics included:
- RESTful principles
- Resource naming conventions
- HTTP methods (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE)
- Status codes explained
- Authentication & Authorization
- API versioning strategies
- Error handling

title: Git and GitHub for Beginners
creator: freeCodeCamp
desc:
Complete Git and GitHub tutorial for absolute beginners. Learn version control, collaboration, and how to contribute to open source projects.

What's covered:
- Git installation and setup
- Basic commands (add, commit, push, pull)
- Branching and merging
- Resolving conflicts
- GitHub workflow
- Pull requests
- Collaboration tips

title: Docker Crash Course
creator: TechWorld with Nana
desc:
Learn Docker from scratch! This crash course teaches you containerization, Docker commands, Dockerfile creation, and Docker Compose for multi-container applications.

Course outline:
- What is Docker?
- Installation and setup
- Docker images and containers
- Dockerfile best practices
- Docker Compose
- Volumes and networks
- Deployment strategies

title: JavaScript ES6+ Features
creator: Academind
desc:
Master modern JavaScript with ES6+ features including arrow functions, destructuring, spread operator, async/await, and more. Essential knowledge for every JavaScript developer.

Features covered:
- Arrow functions
- Template literals
- Destructuring
- Spread and rest operators
- Promises and async/await
- Modules
- Classes

title: MongoDB Tutorial for Beginners
creator: The Net Ninja
desc:
Complete MongoDB tutorial covering NoSQL databases, CRUD operations, indexing, aggregation, and integration with Node.js applications.

Learning objectives:
- MongoDB basics
- CRUD operations
- Schema design
- Indexing strategies
- Aggregation framework
- Integration with Node.js
- Best practices

title: Tailwind CSS Crash Course
creator: Fireship
desc:
Learn Tailwind CSS utility-first framework in under 15 minutes! Build beautiful, responsive interfaces faster with this modern CSS framework.

Quick overview:
- Tailwind setup
- Utility classes
- Responsive design
- Custom configurations
- Best practices
- Real-world examples

title: GraphQL Full Course
creator: Ben Awad
desc:
Deep dive into GraphQL covering queries, mutations, subscriptions, and building a full-stack application with GraphQL, Apollo, and React.

Comprehensive content:
- GraphQL fundamentals
- Queries and mutations
- Schema design
- Resolvers
- Apollo Client
- React integration
- Authentication
- Real-time with subscriptions

title: Python for Data Science
creator: Krish Naik
desc:
Complete Python tutorial for data science covering NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, and machine learning basics. Perfect for aspiring data scientists.

Topics:
- Python basics
- NumPy arrays
- Pandas DataFrames
- Data visualization
- Statistical analysis
- Machine learning intro
- Real projects
